mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTS_ISSUE ( ISSUE_NO, ISSUE_CODE, PDT_CODE, REQUEST_QTY, ISSUED_QTY, LOT_NO, REQUEST_DATE, ISSUE_DATE, ISSUE_STATUS, WAREHOUSE_CODE, ISSUER, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE, SO_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRODUCTS_ISSUE.NEXTVAL, #{issueCode}, #{pdtCode}, #{requestQty}, #{issuedQty}, #{lotNo}, #{requestDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{issueDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{issueStatus}, #{warehouseCode}, #{issuer}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{createdDate}, #{updatedDate}, #{soCode} )
mapper.select:
SELECT PI.ISSUE_NO, PI.ISSUE_CODE, PI.PDT_CODE, P.PDT_NAME, PI.REQUEST_QTY, PI.ISSUED_QTY, PI.LOT_NO, PI.REQUEST_DATE, PI.ISSUE_DATE, PI.ISSUE_STATUS, PI.WAREHOUSE_CODE, PI.ISSUER, PI.CREATED_BY, PI.UPDATED_BY, PI.CREATED_DATE, PI.UPDATED_DATE FROM PRODUCTS_ISSUE PI LEFT JOIN PRODUCTS P ON PI.PDT_CODE = P.PDT_CODE
( PI.ISSUE_CODE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR PI.PDT_CODE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR P.PDT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR PI.LOT_NO LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
ORDER BY PI.ISSUE_NO DESC

SELECT PI.ISSUE_NO, PI.ISSUE_CODE, PI.PDT_CODE, P.PDT_NAME, PI.REQUEST_QTY, PI.ISSUED_QTY, PI.LOT_NO, PI.REQUEST_DATE, PI.ISSUE_DATE, PI.ISSUE_STATUS, PI.WAREHOUSE_CODE, PI.ISSUER, PI.CREATED_BY, PI.UPDATED_BY, PI.CREATED_DATE, PI.UPDATED_DATE FROM PRODUCTS_ISSUE PI LEFT JOIN PRODUCTS P ON PI.PDT_CODE = P.PDT_CODE WHERE PI.ISSUE_NO = #{issueNo}

SELECT W.WAREHOUSE_CODE, W.WHS_NAME AS WAREHOUSE_NAME, L.LOCATION_CODE, L.LOCATION_NAME, L.STOCK_QTY FROM PRODUCTS_STOCK_LOCATION L JOIN WAREHOUSE W ON L.WAREHOUSE_CODE = W.WAREHOUSE_CODE WHERE L.ISSUE_NO = #{issueNo}
SELECT H.HISTORY_NO, H.ISSUE_NO, H.ACTION_TYPE, H.ACTION_DESCRIPTION, H.ACTION_USER, H.ACTION_DATE FROM PRODUCTS_ISSUE_HISTORY H WHERE H.ISSUE_NO = #{issueNo} ORDER BY H.ACTION_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCTS_ISSUE SET ISSUE_STATUS = #{issueStatus}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ISSUE_NO = #{issueNo}

UPDATE PRODUCTS_ISSUE SET ISSUE_STATUS = #{issueStatus}, ISSUED_QTY = #{issuedQty, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{issueDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ISSUE_NO = #{issueNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT SO.SO_NO, SO.SO_CODE, SO.CLT_CODE, SO.EMP_NO, SO.PDT_CODE, P.PDT_NAME, SO.PDT_PRICE, SO.SO_DATE, SO.SHIP_DATE, SO.SO_DUE_DATE, SO.SO_QTY, SO.QTY_UNIT, SO.WHS_CODE, SO.SO_STATUS, SO.SO_USE_YN FROM SALES_ORDER SO LEFT JOIN PRODUCTS P ON SO.PDT_CODE = P.PDT_CODE WHERE
NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PRODUCTS_ISSUE PI WHERE PI.ISSUE_STATUS IN ('출고대기', '검수중', '검사 합격', '출고완료') AND PI.SO_CODE = SO.SO_CODE ) AND SO.SO_STATUS IN ('SO_CONFIRMED', 'SO_PLANNED', 'SO_COMPLETED') AND SO.SO_USE_YN = 'Y'
AND ( SO.SO_CODE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR SO.PDT_CODE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR P.PDT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
ORDER BY SO.SO_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE SALES_ORDER SET SO_STATUS = #{soStatus}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE SO_CODE = #{soCode}
